page.title: 11CHILHAM CASTLE
page.content: The Castle at Chilham is not really a Castle,it is a fortified country house.It has a large estate which includes the remains of a Norman keep.Many people come from all over the world to visit the Castle and its grounds.In the Castle grounds there are various things to see like jousting,the Raptor Centre, Pet land and the woods.Every Sunday in the summer,jousting takes place in the castle grounds.In the Pet land you can see rabbits,donkeys,goats,doves and chickens. The Raptor Centre has a collection of birds of Prey.They are flown to show the visitors. .The Raptor Centre is a very popular place. The castle estate also contains a small lake and a Heronry which is centuries old. The heron is the emblem of the village.
